name: safewebtool
description: SafeWebTool - A collection of browser-based tools for video, image, and text processing

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-tool-files && npm run copy-ffmpeg-files
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production vite build && npm run copy-tool-files && npm run copy-ffmpeg-files
scripts.build:netlify: NODE_ENV=production vite build && npm run copy-tool-files && npm run copy-ffmpeg-files
scripts.copy-tool-files: mkdir -p dist/video dist/image dist/text && cp -f src/video/*.js dist/video/ && cp -f src/image/*.js dist/image/ && cp -f src/text/*.js dist/text/
scripts.copy-ffmpeg-files: mkdir -p dist/ffmpeg && curl -L -o dist/ffmpeg/ffmpeg-core.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ffmpeg/core@0.12.6/dist/esm/ffmpeg-core.js && curl -L -o dist/ffmpeg/ffmpeg-core.wasm https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ffmpeg/core@0.12.6/dist/esm/ffmpeg-core.wasm && curl -L -o dist/ffmpeg/ffmpeg-core.worker.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ffmpeg/core@0.12.6/dist/esm/ffmpeg-core.worker.js
